title: Monorepo Structure
context: Need a modular structure to separate the editor core from the clinical engine and the frontend app.
decision: Use pnpm workspaces with `apps/` and `packages/` directories.

title: Cleanup of Legacy Kit
context: The repository was initialized with a generic 'Kit Fundador' that included unnecessary backend/docker files.
decision: Remove all non-N4N files (GEMINI.md, templates, scripts, etc.) to start with a clean slate.
consequences: Repository is now clean but empty
Need to re-initialize project structure manually
